creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
description: Fringe with warp-twined heading, embroidered and cloth bands, Pieced, printed lining. Red and black plain weave wool ground in the visible area; under the flap the ground is pieced from printed cotton fabrics. The embroidery is worked in polychrome silk threads. There is an edge binding of red cotton fabric. The applied fringe is silk. There is a backing of red printed cotton fabric.
medium: Silk, wool, cotton; chain stitch, cretan stitch
title: Tabaklau ilgich
